name: ias-mvc-skeleton
description: this package contains the basic files needed for an MVC-structured website which can also be used as a Progressive Web App.

scripts.clear: mv -v * ../../ && cd ../../ && mv htaccess .htaccess && mv gitignore .gitignore && rm -r node_modules package-lock.json package.json && echo "You're good to go! You can close this terminal now."

author: Alexandra Moullet
